opcodes.description: set the address of a block of AP memory to be transfered to the SEP for the next request
set the address of a block of AP memory to be used to return the result of a given SEP response
set the size of the memory block to be transfered to the endpoint as a parameter
set the size of the memory block allocated to the be written to as a response to a SEP request
put the SEP into low power and wait for an external IRQ

opcodes.name: kOpCode_Nap

get the current effective security mode of the SEP
perform diagnostics and internal consistancy checks on the the SEP

opcodes.name: kOpCode_ERASE_INSTALL
opcodes.description: Queue the system for a wipe and install of IPSW
